revised_title: Formal Verification and Transformation in Microprocessor Design
tldr: The article discusses the use of mathematical techniques and formal program specification in the design of microprocessors. The authors describe their experience with a formally verified version of a floating-point package, which was used in the design of the T800 microprocessor. They also introduce the Occam transformation system, which helps in transforming and verifying programs, ensuring their correctness and efficiency.
